context.3: Driven by a spirit that does not fear challenges, does not back down, dares to innovate, and dares to act, we have shaped this extraordinary creation.

introduction.p1: Before using the services provided by TurboServlet, you must accept the following terms.
introduction.p2: Accessing and using this website (https://turbo.sys-allnet.com), the client, and any related services (collectively “Turbo”) indicates your acknowledgment that you fully comply with the terms and conditions set forth herein, and guarantees that you will not use any content from services provided by TurboServlet (including this website and its content) for any unlawful or prohibited purpose under these terms.
introduction.p3: In addition to these terms, you must ensure that you also accept our

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.p1: Within the scope permitted by law, Turbo provides online services to users. If a user provides illegal online services to a certain region without authorization from some company, Turbo assumes no responsibility for that action. However, within the legal framework, Turbo can assist in providing relevant data or other legal support. Turbo is not responsible for any consequences arising from such user actions.
serviceDescription.p2: Turbo’s webpages offer hosting services for user-uploaded content, making that content accessible to other users. For user-uploaded content, whether the content is considered offensive, politically sensitive, illegal, infringing intellectual property rights, or otherwise inappropriate, TurboNET has the autonomy to judge and to take actions such as banning relevant accounts. However, Turbo does not guarantee timely removal of violating content uploaded by users, nor does it guarantee that users hold the legal rights to publish or distribute the uploaded content. TurboNET is not liable for any legal consequences arising from user-uploaded or distributed content.

modification.title: Modifications to the Terms of Service
modification.p1: Turbo reserves the right to freely modify these terms.
modification.p2: The latest version of these terms shall prevail. Failure to comply may result in disabling your access to Turbo services.

serviceModification.title: Modification of Services
serviceModification.p1: Turbo reserves the right to modify or discontinue services without notice to users.
serviceModification.p2: When exercising its rights to modify or discontinue services, Turbo shall not be liable to any user or third party.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.p1: All materials herein are provided “as is.” Turbo makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties, including but not limited to implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
disclaimer.p2: Additionally, Turbo does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials, or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site.
disclaimer.p3: Lastly, Turbo is under no obligation (express or implied) to provide any maintenance, technical support, or other support for its services.

liability.title: Liability for Compensation
liability.p2: (i) Your use of and access to Turbo;
liability.p3: (ii) Your violation of any condition in these Terms of Service;
liability.p4: (iii) Your infringement on any third-party rights, including but not limited to copyright, property, or privacy rights;
liability.p5: (iv) Content you upload causing harm to any third party;
liability.p6: (v) Other situations where you should be liable.
liability.p7: Turbo may face losses. You agree to resolve disputes proactively and make necessary compensation, holding TurboServlet harmless from any claims, damages, losses, or liabilities and expenses (including but not limited to attorney fees).
liability.p8: This liability will survive after these Terms of Service and after you cease using Turbo.

clientInstallation.title: Your Installation and Use of the Turbo Client
clientInstallation.p1: Turbo operates through router-based intelligent data relay and distribution, communication enhancements, and traffic optimization management. Turbo only permits users to install and use it legally for testing and development purposes when authorized by a certain company. Once a user installs and deploys or plays on an already installed client, it is deemed as confirmation and acceptance that the above terms are legally binding. If users provide false information or engage in actions that lead to third-party legal claims, Turbo is not liable. Therefore, it is strictly forbidden to provide illegal online services to any region without authorization from a certain company. Within the scope permitted by law, Turbo may assist third parties by providing relevant data or legal support.

siteContent.title: Your Use of Turbo Web Content
siteContent.p1: You understand that while using Turbo’s webpages, you may encounter content uploaded by users from various sources, and Turbo is not responsible for the accuracy, utility, safety, or intellectual property of such user-uploaded content. Furthermore, you understand and acknowledge that you may come across user-uploaded content that is inaccurate, offensive, obscene, or objectionable, and you agree to waive any legal or equitable rights or remedies you may have in this regard, and agree, to the fullest extent permitted by law, to hold TurboServlet, its owners/operators, or licensees harmless from all matters relating to your use of these webpages.

userContent.title: User-Uploaded Content and Content Removal
userContent.p1: You assume full responsibility for your user-uploaded content and for the consequences of its posting or publication. Concerning the user-submitted content, you affirm, represent, or warrant that you own or have the necessary licenses, rights, consents, and permissions to use and to authorize Turbo to use all patents, trademarks, trade secrets, copyrights, or other proprietary rights to enable the inclusion and use of all the user-submitted content as contemplated by the website and by these Terms of Service. Regarding user-submitted content, you agree not to submit material that is protected by copyright, protected by trade secret, or subject to third-party proprietary rights (including privacy and publicity rights), unless you are the owner of such rights or have permission from the rightful owner to post the material and grant Turbo all of the license rights granted herein.
userContent.p2: The content uploaded to Turbo’s online community does not indicate Turbo’s endorsement, nor does it represent the opinions, recommendations, or suggestions expressed therein. Turbo expressly disclaims all liability in connection with user-submitted content. Turbo does not permit copyright infringement or violations of intellectual property rights on its websites, and upon proper notification that such content or user-submitted content infringes others’ intellectual property, Turbo has the right to remove it or take further action.
userContent.p3: Turbo reserves the right to remove any content and user-submitted content, or accounts, without prior notice.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Protection and Information Collection Policy

proprietaryRights.title: Proprietary Rights to Content
proprietaryRights.p1: You acknowledge that the content provided by Turbo—including but not limited to text, software, music, sound, photos, videos, graphics, name references, or other materials provided to users through the service—is protected by copyright, trademark, service marks, patents, or other proprietary rights and laws; thus, users may only use such content with clear authorization.
proprietaryRights.p2: Users shall not, without legal authorization, commit any act that may infringe upon the rights of the copyright owner, including creating derivative works from said content. Turbo reserves the right to pursue legal action.

links.title: Links
links.p1: Turbo may provide links to other websites or resources. You may receive these links in emails or other locations.
links.p2: You acknowledge that Turbo is not responsible for these external websites or resources, nor does Turbo represent its endorsement of their content. Turbo is not liable for any content, advertising, products, or other materials found on or available through such external websites or resources.
links.p3: You agree that Turbo is not liable or responsible, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or purported to be caused by or in connection with the use of or reliance on such external websites or resources, or any content, goods, or services available from them.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.p1: These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the People’s Republic of China.

acknowledgement.title: Acknowledgement
acknowledgement.p1: Portions of this document are based on the 'osu! Terms of Service' and 'Terms of Service - Cytoid,' licensed under CC-BY-NC 4.0.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro-1: Turbo must frequently collect, store, and transmit personal information to provide its services. We strive to make this process as transparent as possible.

intro-2.beforeLink: Before using our services, you must confirm that you have read and understood the
intro-2.betweenLink: and this Privacy Policy, including how and why we use your information, and your use of our services is governed by the

play.title: Gameplay
play.desc: When you play, we collect and store the following for caching purposes:
play.note: Your User ID will never be visible to anyone. Upload logs, stamp collection status, account speed, and other settings will not be disclosed. Your gameplay time, account information, song performance results, account inventory, area completion progress, and gameplay records may (based on your preferences) be used for website updates and display, to improve user experience and system functionality.

register.title: Registration Page
register.desc: When you register an account, we collect and store:

list.4: Password (stored using SHA256 SALT irreversible encryption)

register.note: Your User ID will never be visible to anyone. Only your username is public. We will never sell your email address to third parties.

login.title: Login
login.desc: When you log in, we collect and store:
login.note: Your IP address will never be visible to anyone.

disclosure.title: Disclosure of Your Privacy
disclosure.desc: We will not disclose your private information without your permission, except in the following cases:

list.1: Your username, registration and login times, playtime, account information, song performance data, and play records (all of which can be optionally disclosed on the website).
list.2: Information you have explicitly agreed to disclose.
list.3: Information that must be disclosed to third parties or administrative/judicial authorities as required by law or legal proceedings.

4.beforeLink: If you are found to be in violation of applicable laws or regulations of China, or Turbo
4.afterLink: or related rules, information may need to be disclosed to third parties.

5.beforeLink: Other information that must be disclosed in order to enforce

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.desc: We do not use cookies to track your online activities.

data-security.title: Data Security
data-security.desc: We are committed to ensuring the security of your information; however, no system can be guaranteed free from attack. Even if Turbo were attacked due to uncontrollable circumstances, we will do our utmost to prevent any data breach.

policy-update.title: Policy Updates
policy-update.desc: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy. If it is updated, we will notify you via our website and application.

contact.1: The "Z-LIB" compression skip rate of response data and the number of request retries can reflect the current network conditions.
contact.2: When the compression skip rate exceeds "3%", network instability may occur.
contact.3: When the request retry rate and failure rate are high, there may be issues with the network or server.
